data.name: My Otaku Academia Demo
data.detailed_description:
Plot

In this epic fanfiction visual novel you can play as some of your favorite youtubers as they try to navigate through school in this fictional world. A new student has just arrived at Otaku Academy and is about to make friends for life and maybe some enemy's as well. A sudden disagreement over an anime has started a civil war between two anime clubs at school. However there is not a big enough for the both of them. Who's will be the better club? Find out by playing this cringe but fun visual novel.

Setting

This Demo will use the first three chapters of the visual novel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 Display
